title: Home Tab Loads Correctly with Intro and Features
description: Verify that the Home tab loads successfully showing welcome heading, feature cards, and navigation is functional.

steps.description: Launch the application and navigate to the Home tab
Check that the heading 'Welcome to Sign Language Interpreter' is displayed
Verify feature cards for Detect, Translate, and History are visible
Verify Home tab navigation button is active and clickable

title: Successful Webcam Permission and Start Detection
description: Test that the user can grant webcam permission, start detection, and the system begins processing video frames.

steps.description: Navigate to the Detect tab
When prompted, grant webcam permission
Verify the webcam video feed is visible and streaming
Click the Start Detection button
Confirm that detection process begins, showing detected phrase and confidence

title: Stop Detection Disables Webcam and Updates UI
description: Verify that clicking Stop Detection halts webcam feed and updates UI accordingly without errors.

steps.description: Start detection by enabling webcam and clicking Start Detection
Click the Stop Detection button
Ensure webcam feed stops streaming
Verify detection results are no longer updated

title: Detection Accuracy Validation Under Normal Conditions
description: Check that the detection results show phrases with confidence scores above or equal to 85% in a normal scenario.

steps.description: Start detection and perform well-known sign gestures
Detected phrase is accurate and confidence score is >= 85%
Alternative predictions are shown correctly ranked by confidence percentage

title: Detection Processing Time Below 200 milliseconds
description: Verify the time from camera frame capture to detection display is within 200 milliseconds.

steps.description: Start detection and perform gesture
Measure latency from frame capture to detected phrase display
Assert detection processing time is less than or equal to 200 milliseconds

title: Language Selection Changes Translation Display
description: Check that selecting different languages translates the detected phrase accordingly and updates the UI correctly.

steps.description: Detect a known phrase via webcam
Select each supported language from the dropdown one-by-one
Verify translated text updates correctly for the selected language
Verify a loading indicator appears during translation fetch

title: Translation Accuracy for All Supported Languages
description: Validate that the translations for detected phrases are accurate for each supported language: English, Spanish, French, German, Hindi, Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Arabic, Portuguese.

steps.description: Perform detection of a known phrase
Change language selector to each supported language
For each language, confirm the translation text matches expected phrase meaning

title: Detection History Records All Entries Correctly
description: Verify all detected phrases are recorded in History with correct timestamps, confidence scores, translations, and selected language metadata.

steps.description: Perform 3 distinct detections with different phrases and languages
Navigate to History tab
Verify history table shows all 3 entries with correct timestamps and matching phrases
Confirm confidence scores and translations correspond to each entry
Check language metadata is displayed correctly for each record

title: Clear Detection History with Confirmation
description: Test clearing detection history triggers confirmation and on confirmation, history is fully cleared.

steps.description: Navigate to History tab with existing entries
Click Clear History button
Verify a confirmation dialog appears requesting user confirmation
Cancel the confirmation and verify history remains intact
Click Clear History button again and confirm to clear
Verify all history records are removed
Confirm a user-friendly empty state message is displayed

title: Backend Health Status Indicator Updates Correctly
description: Check that the backend connection status indicator shows green/Connected when API is healthy and red/Disconnected when API is down.

steps.description: Launch the app connected to the backend
Verify the health indicator shows green color and 'Connected' badge
Simulate backend API failure or disconnect
Verify the indicator changes to red color and badge shows 'Disconnected'
Restore backend connection
Confirm the indicator goes back to green and badge displays 'Connected'

title: Backend Health Check Executes Every 10 Seconds
description: Verify that the backend health status is polled and updated every 10 seconds during app usage.

steps.description: Open developer tools network tab and filter health check API requests
Observe health check request frequency over 30 seconds
Confirm health check API is called approximately every 10 seconds

title: Side Navigation Bar Allows Seamless Switching
description: Verify the side navigation bar icons and buttons allow switching between Home, Detect, and History tabs smoothly with UI feedback.

steps.description: Click the Home tab button in the sidebar
Confirm the Home tab content is displayed
Click the Detect tab button
Confirm the Detect tab page is shown with webcam feed ready
Click the History tab button
Confirm the History page is displayed with detection records

title: Webcam Permission Denied Shows Appropriate Error
description: Verify user denial of webcam permission results in informative error message and no detection starts.

steps.description: Navigate to Detect tab
Deny the browser's request for webcam permission
Verify error message is displayed indicating webcam permission is required
Confirm the Start Detection button remains disabled or no detection occurs

title: Handle No Detection Scenario Gracefully
description: Verify the app UI behaves correctly when no sign language gesture is detected (e.g., shows 'no detection' or similar feedback).

steps.description: Start detection and keep a non-sign language pose in front of webcam
Ensure UI shows appropriate message or empty result instead of stale or incorrect data

title: UI Responsiveness and Layout on Different Screen Sizes
description: Verify the application UI including navigation bar, tabs, buttons, tables, and detection display renders correctly and remains usable on various screen sizes and resolutions.

steps.description: Open the app on desktop, tablet, and mobile viewport sizes
Verify side navigation transforms or remains accessible appropriately
Confirm detection results, translation display, and history table content are visible and readable

title: Alternative Predictions Show Correct Confidence Bars
description: Test that alternative predicted phrases appear with correct confidence percentage bars matching the data.

steps.description: Start detection and perform ambiguous or complex signs with multiple valid predictions
Verify alternative predictions are listed ranked by confidence
Confirm confidence bars visually correspond to confidence score values
